thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Victoria

author: Victoria
title: Victoria
text:
Been a few years that I have been getting my supply of novels through your company. My grand-daughter (9 years) has told her classmates and the teacher about your company. They were impressed that she has every single book (except books for boys) that Dan Guttman has written. Wondering who gave them to her and the quantity and great condition of each one (She shared your company's name with all). Most of all the $$$
that must have been spent! I, myself, have ordered at least 18 adult books just recently. Can't beat the price or the great condition - like new!!! Have to stop praising & bragging now ---- Have lots of reading to do. VH
